title: Council Regulation (EEC) No 624/87 of 27 February 1987 extending Regulation (EEC) No 1707/86 on the conditions governing imports of agricultural products originating in third countries following the accident at the Chernobyl nuclear power station
header:
COUNCIL  REGULATION (EEC) No 624/87
of 27 February 1987
extending Regulation (EEC) No 1707/86 on the conditions governing imports of agricultural products originating in third countries following the accident at the Chernobyl nuclear power-station
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: In Article 7 of Regulation (EEC) No 1707/86, '28 February 1987' is hereby replaced by '31 October 1987'.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 March 1987.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 27 February 1987.
For the Council
The President
L. TINDEMANS
(1) OJ No L 146, 31. 5. 1986, p. 88.
